snippet: France's PSA Group has agreed to buy Opel from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion), creating a new European car giant to challenge market leader Volkswagen....

headline.main: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio
headline.print_headline: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio

lead_paragraph: France's PSA Group has agreed to buy Opel from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion), creating a new European car giant to challenge market leader Volkswagen.
